text.title: Saudi Arabian court convicts poet of apostasy, sentences to death
text.head: Saudi Arabian court convicts poet of apostasy, sentences to death
Sources

list.item: Angus McDowall. "Saudi Arabian court sentences Palestinian poet Ashraf Fayadh to death for apostasy" — The Independent , November 20, 2015
David Batty. "Saudi court sentences poet to death for renouncing Islam" — The Guardian , November 20, 2015
